summary:
[b]CHSBHC[/b] conversions of the \"svs fox and wolf\" (1.02 I believe) by Severus616.
<http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26280>
descriptionHtml:
Svs Fox and Wolf armor for CHSBHC, originally by Severus616:  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4661369

[this mod only changes the cuirass .nif\'s :D ]

[b]Requirements[/b]: 

-original mod here (1.02 I believe): http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26280/3496215
-this mod, only full weight supported (because of all the components in the nif\'s!).

[b]Installation[/b]: 
fire up main mod, overwrite with this one. Hopefully NMM compatible :D

[b]Known Issues[/b]: 

-some clipping when walking between legs, at crotch
-some clipping when sneaking between legs (maybe)
-PM me if there are any texture issues, I tried to stay within original
  mod bounds.
author: Severus616

files.name: CHSBHC svs fox and wolf - pantless version
